name: Neopets - Neoboard Topics
description:
- Stretches the Neoboard Topic responses (inside a board after you click it) to fill the 'white space' that blocked ads leave behind on the right side
- Makes smilies in board titles and in user posts smaller, so they stay the same size as the line of text
additional_info: 07/27/2018 - Updated & fixed all issues! Uploaded new screenshot(s)
